{/* Imagen principal */}
{/* Información */}

Exhibition

Corner Gallery & Studio, Carabanchel

Digital Protest Art Collection

This exhibition is part of Artivism Digital Wall, featuring the most iconic protests transformed into unique digital artworks. Corner Gallery & Studio is an artistic production studio and art gallery located in the San Isidro neighborhood of Carabanchel. A meeting point for dialogue between different cultural agents, with the purpose of promoting activities and programs related to contemporary creation in the so-called ISO Polygon of Carabanchel.

Artist workshop, exhibition space and meeting point, Corner Gallery offers in its 200 square meters an image of artistic workspace and on the other hand a diaphanous and bright room with direct access from the street. Our work explores the aesthetic and conceptual possibilities of digital art, treating code as if it were paint, and protest as the highest form of artistic expression.

Address

C. Cañete, 17, Carabanchel, 28019 Madrid

Exhibition Period

16-19 September 2025
